content:
That's great! It's always fascinating to revisit our past experiences and reflect on how they've shaped us. The University of Michigan is a renowned institution, and its business program is highly respected. Did you attend the University of Michigan for your undergraduate or graduate studies?

What specifically did the article mention about the University of Michigan's business program that caught your attention? Was it a particular program, faculty member, or initiative that stood out to you?

Reflecting on your own experience at the university, what were some of the most valuable lessons you learned or experiences you had during your time there? Did you have any particularly influential professors, mentors, or classmates who helped shape your perspective or career path?

Sharing your thoughts and experiences can be a great way to process and reflect on your journey. I'm here to listen and offer any insights if you'd like to discuss further!
